Title: Mechanisms of Episodic Memory in Epilepsy: A Optogenetics Study
SpecificAim1: Characterize Episodic Memory alterations in Epilepsy using Optogenetics
SpecificAim2: Manipulate Hippocampus activity and measure effects on Episodic Memory
SpecificAim3: Establish translational relevance through Connectivity measure measures
Innovation: First application of Optogenetics to study Episodic Memory in Epilepsy
Significance: Addresses critical gap in understanding Epilepsy mechanisms
Approach: n=97 Human participants, Between-subjects RCT, Optogenetics, MRI scanner
PI_Background: Expertise in Optogenetics and Epilepsy research
Timeline: Pilot: 2 months, Main: 8 months, Analysis: 4 months
ExpectedOutcomes: 3-5 publications, preliminary data for R01, potential biomarkers
